thx globe !!!
the sound problem is fixed now 
all i had to do was to go in mixer and increase singularity volume to 100% now sound is loud and clear.
funny thing is that winamp was on when i started the game and even its volume was decreased by around 80% :D
To hiteshbisht16 : that is the particularity that makes the low sound happen , the game uses the regular mixer that have instructions in some circnstances originaly to reduce the sound in 80% .
We'll just have to hope that Garena or some other Through-LAN hosting program adds Singularity to its play-list some day :)

If it doesn't work, then try running it in compatibility mode fow win XP SP2.

FREEZING PROBLEM SOLUTION:nProblem - The game freezes for 2-3 secs after every 10-15 secs.nCause - Every time the game starts it tries to access the internet. This is what cause the freezes.nSolution - First connet to the internet. Then start the game and select Start Game. Then select New Game/ Continue. After the game loads pause it and press Alt + Tab. Disconnect from the internet if you want to. Then click on the game on the taskbar and play without any freezes. (you can keep the internet connection on if you want to)nYou have to do this every time you start the game.
